scenario_name: Normal Customer Onboarding in Investment Banking
description: A new high-net-worth individual is undergoing the onboarding process with a private wealth management firm. This involves KYC/AML checks, account creation, and initial investment allocation.  The process should proceed smoothly and within regulatory compliance.
initial_goal: Onboard new client, Mr. John Smith, with $5,000,000 USD investment, following all KYC/AML and regulatory guidelines.
constraints: Investment limits based on risk profile
Data privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA) must be adhered to
